events.message: I received my order last week but I want to request a refund because the item is not what I expected and I do not want to keep it.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning wanting money back.
An agent was assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please provide details about the reason for the return and any order identification.
My order number is 123456789. The item does not match the description on the website, so I want a full refund.
We have approved your refund request. Please return the item using the prepaid shipping label we will send shortly.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the prepaid return label and will send the item back soon.
Your refund case is now marked as resolved after we confirmed the return shipment initiation.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund. Please let us know if you have any other questions or concerns.
We are closing this refund case now that you have confirmed receipt of your money back. Thank you for your cooperation.
